<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/tickets/list"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



使用 Bearer Token 获取工单列表，可选分页。

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"query","name":"page","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"default":1},"description":"页码，从 1 开始"},{"in":"query","name":"size","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":200,"default":20},"description":"每页数量"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"成功","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"tkt_10001"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"New Ticket Title"},"content":{"type":"string","example":"Ticket content description"},"priority":{"type":"string","enum":["low","medium","high"],"example":"medium"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["open","in_progress","closed"],"example":"open"},"assigneeId":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"example":"u_987654321"},"createdAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"required":["id","title","content","priority","status"],"title":"Ticket"}}}}},"401":{"description":"未授权"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
